means: 阿斯特拉罕（前苏联欧洲部分东南部一城市，位于伏尔加河三角洲上，这个鞑靼人的城市曾于1556年被恶魔伊万征服。人口493， 000）

sentence.Network_en: The impresario had buttoned his astrakhan coat.
sentence.Network_cn: 乐团经理扣好了羔皮外套.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 阿斯特拉罕（astrakhan）（Astrakhan）,伏尔加河流经的最后一个大城市。属俄罗斯。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: named after the city of Astrakhanin Russia,from which the fleeces were exported

entry.tran: （用于制造大衣和帽子）阿斯特拉罕羔羊皮
entry.def: Astrakhan is black or grey curly fur from the skins of lambs. It is used for making coats and hats.

auth_sentence.content: In Astrakhan experts will discuss modern approaches to ecotourism and biodiversity conservation of the Volga Delta.
